name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Iron Man: Tech and Heroism in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience Tony Stark’s brilliance and technology with futuristic visuals and smooth shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enter the world of Tony Stark with stunning visuals inspired by Iron Man's iconic suit and high-tech brilliance.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek and modern interface reflecting Stark Industries’ innovation for seamless browsing.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay on schedule with a futuristic display that matches Iron Man's cutting-edge technology.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Reach your favorite websites instantly with smooth navigation tools.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into browser games that bring the action and excitement of Iron Man to life.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform lightning-fast searches with your preferred engine, integrated into the theme for efficiency.
🚀 More Extension: Explore additional features to customize and supercharge your browsing experience, Stark-style.
